printer_notes.1.4.4:
Dont remove the following keywords! These keywords are used in the "compatible printer" condition of the print and filament profiles to link the particular print and filament profiles to this printer profile.
PRINTER_VENDOR_MAKERGEAR
PRINTER_MODEL_MAKERGEAR_M2_DUAL

end_gcode.1.4.4:
M104 S0 T1 ; turn off right extruder
M104 S0 T0 ; turn off left extruder
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
G91 ; relative mode
G1 Z10 ; lift 10mm
G90 ; absolute mode
G28 X0 ; home X axis
M84 ; disable motors

start_gcode.1.4.4:
M108 S0 ; Turn on M2 fans
; Turn off hotends to reduce ooze on the bed during startup
; NOTE: this does not explicitly wait for the hotends to completely cool down
M104 T0 S0
M104 T1 S0

{if first_layer_bed_temperature[1] < first_layer_bed_temperature[0]}
M140 S{first_layer_bed_temperature[0]}     ; Set bed temperature
M190 S{first_layer_bed_temperature[0]}	   ; Wait for bed to reach temperature
{endif}

{if first_layer_bed_temperature[0] < first_layer_bed_temperature[1]}
M140 S{first_layer_bed_temperature[1]}     ; Set bed temperature
M190 S{first_layer_bed_temperature[1]}	   ; Wait for bed to reach temperature
{endif}

T1 ; Switch to right extruder offsets for homing
G28 ; Home all axes
T0 ; Switch to left extruder
G1 X0 Y50 Z0.3 F9600 ; Move forward to avoid binder clips
G1 X200 Z10 F3600 ; Move off platform

; Set hotend temperature
M104 T0 S{first_layer_temperature[0]}
M104 T1 S{first_layer_temperature[1]}

; Wait for hotends to reach temperature
M109 T0 S{first_layer_temperature[0]}
M109 T1 S{first_layer_temperature[1]}


{if temperature[1] == 0}
; Single Mode - Left Purge script

G1 Z0.4 ; Position nozzle above buildplate
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder
G1 E25 F225 ; Purge left extruder
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder
G1 X160 Z0.1 E1.0 F1200 ; Slow wipe
G1 X140 Z0.25 ; Lift
{endif}

{if temperature[0] == 0}
; Single Mode - Right Purge Script

G1 Z0.4 ; Position nozzle above buildplate
T1 ; Switch to right extruder
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder
G1 E25 F225 ; Purge right extruder
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder
G1 X160 Z0.1 E1.0 F1200 ; Slow wipe
G1 X140 Z0.25 ; Lift
{endif}

{if temperature[0] > 0 and temperature[1] > 0}
; Dual Mode - Purge Script
G1 Z0.4 ; Position nozzle above buildplate
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder
G1 E25 F225 ; Purge left extruder
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder
T1 ; Set right extruder
G1 E25 F225 ; Purge right extruder
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder
G1 X160 Z0.1 E1.0 F1200 ; Slow wipe
G1 X140 Z0.25 ; Lift
T0
G92 E0 ; Zero extruder
{endif}
